    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String escape(java.lang.String value)
      Wrap the string in "" if it contains special symbols SYMBOL_TO_ESCAPE, please refer to needEscape(String).
      static boolean needEscape(java.lang.String value)
      Some symbols, Such as "", "<", "&", "'", "\"" etc., are not permitted in XML document and they need to be escaped.
      Currently the symbols SYMBOL_TO_ESCAPE will be checked.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • escape

        public static java.lang.String escape(java.lang.String value)
        Wrap the string in "" if it contains special symbols SYMBOL_TO_ESCAPE, please refer to needEscape(String).
        Parameters:
        value - String, the value to be escaped if it contains special symbols
        Returns:
        String, the escaped string

      • needEscape

        public static boolean needEscape(java.lang.String value)
        Some symbols, Such as "", "<", "&", "'", "\"" etc., are not permitted in XML document and they need to be escaped.
        Currently the symbols SYMBOL_TO_ESCAPE will be checked.
        Parameters:
        value - String, the value to test
        Returns:
        boolean if the value needs to be escaped.
